about_the_game:
Crawl into the ultimate co-op RPG lizard simulator, set in a variety of lush environments ranging from beautiful jungle rainforests to harsh dry savannahs. Grow your lizard to incredible sizes while honing your platforming skills to become the ultimate lizard! Lizard Quest is unlike anything you’ve seen before!


Run around and cause an absolute ruckus! Chomp down on local fruit and vegetables to grow in size and level up, spend growth points on upgrading your stats. From jump height and movement speed to attack damage and chomp rate - there's no limit to your reptilian antics!


Challenge your parkour, puzzle-solving, platforming and pillaging abilities! With many cliffs and mountains to climb, rivers to cross and secret areas to explore - this ever-expanding world of adventure and excitement is yours for the taking.


Don’t grow alone! Lizard Quest supports gameplay of up to 20 lizards per online multiplayer server. With a variety of public servers from all over the world and plenty of friends to be made - the jungle is truly your social playground. Itching for something a little more private? Host your own local server or crawl solo in a singleplayer world!


Climb in style with an array of different lizard skins and hats to dress your Sunday best! With over 10+ hats to discover, collect and show-off as well as an array of different lizard styles and aesthetics to unlock as you rebirth into new ages - there’s always new room to express yourself!


Consider yourself a competitive crocodilian? Crunch the competition with a rebirthing and prestige system that lets you climb the online scoreboards! Give your friends a run for their scales as you climb the ranks and leave them at the bottom of the local leaderboards!

name: Lizard Quest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Crawl into the ultimate co-op RPG lizard simulator, set in a variety of lush environments ranging from beautiful jungle rainforests to harsh dry savannahs. Grow your lizard to incredible sizes while honing your platforming skills to become the ultimate lizard!
